casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Owen JACOBS 126PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2017 Paul F. Herzog, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Jacobs, John Owen. Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of August 2017 by N.C. Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of August 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
